name: FPS: The Game Show
description:
You are a contestant on deadly game show. You signed up for a better life but audience signed up the entertainment.

Run around guns blazing to destroy turrets and claim rewards to stay alive.  Don't stay still for too long. It's boring for the audience ... and your health will start to drain.

Many things are left to the roll of the dice. Be careful and best of luck contestant!

Controls:

  • Look -> Mouse
  • WASD -> Move
  • Left Mouse Button (LMB) -> Fire

Rewards:

  • "Woosh" Sound -> Increase Bullet Speed
  • "Power Up" Sound -> Increase Bullet Damage
  • "Open Potion/Bottle" Sound-> Increase Health

Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Theme: Roll of the Dice
